you

I'm doing great you know it's a

that sounds really great so how was it

there really were lots of people outside

ohayo but the one that they had in

because they were there for 48 hours

that's what it comes down to that is

I don't think Joe Biden is actually

we'll see a switch up there soon
I think you're gonna see it go down to

now we don't see that happening right
and I think you're absolutely correct

in fact there
several times where he could have
respond and so he would just trail off

think not that I want to you know tout

Kamala Harris continues to be the
stronger part of that I still don't

somewhere down the line if somebody else

especially if it's Joe Biden but we'll
see what happens right so tell me a

with the Trump campaign it's a very
funny story you know because I by
audition for The Apprentice many years
ago I got kicked off I didn't even make

gotten a call from a journalist locally
it sent me a message on Facebook
actually he said they're looking for a

okay what have I got to lose so I did
but it was not that easy I started
making phone calls falling them up with
the emails to our local re-see which is
a Republican Executive Committee and
finally one day I just showed up and I'm
like what's going on you guys aren't

they're like can you sit down for a

this gonna be
and the bottom line is she indicated to

did is I contacted the co-chairman for

Republican Party of Florida Chairman Joe
brooders and I said you know I really
want to do this I think I'd be great at

he's the reason I told him as the reason
I became the chairman because had he not

ever got it accomplished and so
eventually we immediately do this this
funder this event with over 100 people

and I knew we were onto something now
certainly the left and has an openly gay
conservative you can imagine the LGBTQ
community just I'm the most hated gay

the reality was we had this momentum
going and that was just on a momentum in
Orange County it was a momentum in
Florida it was a momentum in the country
and so the best part was we won the
presidential preference primary I
believe was in March in 2016 and now
we've got to take our way through this
elegant selection process as we recall
was really challenging they were ready
to challenge him on the floor because
the far right that the the swamp was so

could not control that they didn't want

know but what was it three or four weeks

the one he's gonna be the nominee and we
take that through an election night win
which to be honest to this day I still
can't even believe it I mean we had been

media was trying to interview me that
evening and I just couldn't do it
I was just finally it was all hitting me
you know we were just exhausted but I

you really think is gonna happen tonight
and I said we're gonna win and he just
looked at me it was a pot this is long
pause and I saw him a few weeks after

were crazy well guess what we weren't

because I was actually representing
Salem media so we were on you know you

the majority is with him
they support him and he has done so much
